item.title: Analyzing U.S. Storm Events: A Data-Driven Approach to Disaster Preparedness - Part 2
item.description: In this second part of our analysis, we address the key questions posed at the beginning of our investigation. By analyzing storm event data from January 2014 to June 2024, we uncovered several important insights that can inform disaster preparedness strategies.

item.title: Analyzing U.S. Storm Events: A Data-Driven Approach to Disaster Preparedness - Part 1
item.description:
Introduction

How can we prepare for storms before they hit? After completing the Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate, I wanted to dive into a real-world problemâ€”analyzing U.S. storm events. By studying past storm data, we can uncover patterns that help improve disaster preparedness.
